snippet: BERLIN, June 1 (AP)--German spokesmen laid claim tonight to the destruction of the battleship Ne1son, pride of the British Home Fleet....

headline.main: BATTLESHIP NELSON SUNK, NAZIS CLAIM; They Say 700 Men Were Lost on 33,950-Ton Ship That Cost $37,500,000 LONDON IGNORES REPORT Silence Is Interpreted to Mean That German Story Is Not Worthy of Denial

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, June 1 (AP)--German spokesmen laid claim tonight to the destruction of the battleship Ne1son, pride of the British Home Fleet.
